reviews.review: If you paid for the game congrats you're very unlikely to run into cheaters (though still possible). If not, good luck playing the game without running into any. Over all good as a game though other people screeching through their mics can happen and just ruin the match.
Игра хорошая , но мой кот нагадил  мне в ботинок, поэтому дизлайк
This game is honestly really good and takes time to learn the mechanics and develop your aim for this game but getting good at aiming here honestly improves aim everywhere else.
this game is good for playing with your friends

RU: Спустя небольшое время мое мнение изменилось. Я считаю то что разработчики пытаться усовершенствовать игру. Да кейсы это заработок денег но для других игроков они стараются удивить красивыми и качественными скинами. Они также делают обновления и для обычных игроков. Исправляю многие проблемы. Читеров не убрать они есть везде,но по крайней мере на прайме я их почти не встречаю.
9/10 останется той самой легендарной игрой!!!
EN: After a short time, my opinion changed. I believe that the developers are trying to improve the game. Yes cases are earning money but for other players they try to surprise with beautiful and high-quality skins. They also make updates for regular players. I fix many problems. Cheaters not to remove they are everywhere but at least on Prime I almost do not meet them.
9/10 will remain the same legendary game!!!

Where do i even start with this game. First of all the gameplay is really good and competitive just like how it is meant to be and the skins and the whole market thing is a very good way to start investing your money and time into because you always find yourself investing in skins and trading them. The graphics are still decent and they don't have to be too overboard because its a competitive game so you don't really need the graphics alot of the time. overall this game is worth your time and if you haven't already you should buy the prime status upgrade because its just really worth it.
one of the greatest games of all time
this game saved my me and my daughter's relationship. 10/10

It's challenging and really good!

Se formos analisar como adultos e de acordo com os meus conhecimentos e depois de vários estudos e pesquisas que fiz na Google e outras bibliotecas reconhecidas mundialmente chegaremos a conclusão que esse meu comentário não tem nada a ver com o que vocês querem saber, mas eu particularmente fico muito feliz quando lêem o meu comentário até ao fim Obrigado..
